name: Po's Patches
description:
Po's Patches

The farmer is gone for the day, but work has gotta get done. Play as his handy scarecrow, Porapum, in gathering the day's harvest!

Buy and plant seeds and watch them grow! But beware: Pesky crows will try to eat up your crops! Ward them off before they can get the last bite!

Controls

Arrow keys- MovementZ- Plant seed
- Harvest crop
- Buy seed (dog merchant)
- Sell crop (dropbox)X- Swing broomstick
- Change seed selection (dog merchant)

Credits

Art: Rita (ribred)

Code: Phoenix Stroh (GameKwng)

Sound: Xander Munc (xandermunc)
